docs.lead_paragraph: First lady Michelle Obama chopped parsley and pine nuts for a salad with 20 school children in Milan on Wednesday to spread her message: Make more home-cooked meals, and you will be healthier.

headline.main: Michelle Obama Makes Salad in Milan in Home-Cooking Campaign
headline.print_headline: Michelle Obama Makes Salad in Milan in Home-Cooking Campaign

docs.snippet: First lady Michelle Obama chopped parsley and pine nuts for a salad with 20 school children in Milan on Wednesday to spread her message: Make more home-cooked meals, and you will be healthier.

docs.lead_paragraph: Green Bay Packers Hall of Fame quarterback Bart Starr is participating in a clinical trial using stem cells as a possible treatment for strokes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama took her campaign for healthy eating overseas on Wednesday, but let it slip that she still has work to do at home.

headline.main: US First Lady Promotes Key Topic in Milan: Eating Wisely
headline.print_headline: US First Lady Promotes Key Topic in Milan: Eating Wisely

docs.snippet: Michelle Obama took her campaign for healthy eating overseas on Wednesday, but let it slip that she still has work to do at home.

docs.lead_paragraph: You may not even know you are eating them, but trans fats will soon be mostly gone from your food. The Food and Drug Administration said Tuesday it will require food companies to phase them out over the next three years because the agency says they are a threat to public health.

headline.main: Q&A: What Are Trans Fats and Why Are They Unhealthy?

docs.lead_paragraph: Out of respect for tradition, Muslim communities of the world break their fasts with the fruit, which is always available.

headline.main: During Ramadan, Dates Are a Unifying Staple

docs.abstract: Meals served for iftar, or fast-breaking meal, during Muslim holiday of Ramadan are typically filling and nourishing and frequently contain dates; recipes for roast chicken with couscous, dates and buttered almonds, dates with cream and chopped pistachios and wheat berries with roasted carrots, harissa yogurt and dates given.
docs.snippet: Out of respect for tradition, Muslim communities of the world break their fasts with the fruit, which is always available.

docs.lead_paragraph: Health experts said the elimination of artery-clogging, artificial trans fats from the food supply would save thousands of lives a year.

headline.main: F.D.A. Sets 2018 Deadline to Rid Foods of Trans Fats
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Sets 2018 Deadline to Rid Foods of Trans Fats

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Admin announces decision requiring food industry to eliminate all artificial trans fats from products by 2018, which agency says will likely save thousands of lives a year due to effects consumption has on cholesterol; determines that partially hydrogenated oils are no longer recognized as safe additive to food products, and that if companies wish to use them they must prove in face of overwhelming evidence that they are safe to consume.
docs.snippet: Health experts said the elimination of artery-clogging, artificial trans fats from the food supply would save thousands of lives a year.

docs.lead_paragraph: Upshot commenters share some strategies for staying away from overeating.
docs.snippet: Upshot commenters share some strategies for staying away from overeating.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Bread Lab at Washington State University is working to improve the quality of the chain’s tortillas and make them as tasty as an abuelita’s.

headline.main: Chipotle’s Quest to Develop a Better Tortilla
headline.print_headline: Chipotle’s Quest to Make Artisanal Tortillas

docs.abstract: Chain restaurant Chipotle Mexican Grill has tasked Bread Lab at Washington State University with creating tortilla that tastes homemade but can be produced on mass scale; project is part of chain's effort to raise nutritional value of its food.
docs.snippet: The Bread Lab at Washington State University is working to improve the quality of the chain’s tortillas and make them as tasty as an abuelita’s.

docs.lead_paragraph: Debate over end-of-life care has started at France's Senate, with a bill that would allow doctors to keep terminally ill patients sedated until death comes, but stops short of legalizing euthanasia and assisted suicide.

headline.main: France's Senate Debates Terminal Sedation, Not Euthanasia
headline.print_headline: France's Senate Debates Terminal Sedation, Not Euthanasia

docs.snippet: Debate over end-of-life care has started at France's Senate, with a bill that would allow doctors to keep terminally ill patients sedated until death comes, but stops short of legalizing euthanasia and assisted suicide.

docs.lead_paragraph: Popular foods like pie crusts, frostings and microwave popcorn will be largely rid of artery-clogging trans fats after a decision by the Obama administration to phase them out over the next three years.

headline.main: FDA Tells Food Industry to Phase Out Artificial Trans Fats
headline.print_headline: FDA Tells Food Industry to Phase Out Artificial Trans Fats

docs.snippet: Popular foods like pie crusts, frostings and microwave popcorn will be largely rid of artery-clogging trans fats after a decision by the Obama administration to phase them out over the next three years.
